name: 8ac6cdd4-9048-4ee0-9409-ad502b4c6e59
goal: Identify the orders that the user needs to order depending on the events.

steps.text: Place an order for customer based on event.
Ask customer what is the event and how many persons?
event examples are party, sports , barbeque, weekend plan, date plan, weekly shopping
Based on the event (number of person) suggest the recipes and ingredients.
if it is weekly shopping event, ask customer
how many persons in the family ?
ask items needed to be added in shopping list
add this to an existing shopping list if one exists
Prepare the shopping list using the input provided by customer
confirm with the user that they are happy to place the order and send this to a the supermarket.
if customer confirms then call  ${PLAYBOOK: Place order}
